ActorTalk: Welcome to Kuroro Coffee, what can I—wait? Gray Raven Commandant!
Hello. We're here to try the interactive brewing experience.
Interactive experience... Oh thank goodness. I thought I'd have to brew coffee in front of the Gray Raven Commandant. What a relief...
Ahem—what I meant to say is, all the equipment is ready. Feel free to use anything you like.
Maybe... we could try making a clover pattern.
That'd be wonderful. I'll leave it to you then, Commandant.
(The silky foam spreads across the coffee's surface. With a gentle turn of the wrist, the outline of a clover slowly appears, forming a perfect design.)
Sorry, I couldn't help myself after seeing something that perfect... Would you like to try some desserts? They just came out of the oven and are at their best right now. I can bring a few over.
No thanks. We heard Kowloong Restaurant has new dishes today. We're planning to try them out soon.
I've heard about those new dishes too, but if you're heading there now, the line's probably huge. A lot of our customers stopped here to kill time after grabbing a queue number over there.
It's that busy? In that case...
When you mentioned the new dishes this morning, I went ahead and booked us a table.
I see. Good thinking, Commandant. Let's head over in a bit.
What a dependable partner... I've got to work hard too. I'll become a barista as reliable as the Gray Raven Commandant!
Want me to show you how it's done?
